name: Lythouse
description: Lythouse, founded in 2018, pioneers safety and happiness solutions for citizens and enterprises through data-driven innovation. Our state-of-the-art safety solution ensures comprehensive workplace safety, offering instant emergency assistance at the push of a button, including ambulance, roadside aid, and legal support. AI tools provide timely emergency alerts for added security. Our Happiness Solution promotes mental and physical well-being with tailored wellness plans and virtual classes.

enhanced_description: Lythouse, founded in 2018, delivers innovative, data-driven solutions for citizen and enterprise safety and happiness. Its AI-driven, state-of-the-art platform provides comprehensive workplace safety, offering instant emergency assistance (ambulance, roadside aid, legal support) and timely emergency alerts through AI tools. The platform also includes a Happiness Solution focused on mental and physical well-being, featuring tailored wellness plans and virtual classes. Lythouse is ISO certified, demonstrating a commitment to business continuity and data security, and has a proven track record with over 14,000 SOS instances handled.
